name: Enchant Farm
storyline: On a cursed islet where the very notions of death and reincarnation have been rejected, where mighty RULERS shape the many territories at their own whims, masses of hungering beings known as the MOUJA are locked in an infinite, undying struggle against one another, stealing each other's Souls in the hope that they, too, might attain the power of a RULER. Many heroes have tried to break the islet's curse. All have failed. Will you be the one to terminate the never-ending cycle of war and misery that haunts the islet of Kotoh? Or, will your eternal Soul be no more than a lucky MOUJA's next meal?
summary: A highly customizable, exploration-focused game with countless secrets to uncover, bosses to defeat, and allies to recruit. ENCHANT FARM is one of the earliest and best JRPG adaptations of the "Souls-like" formula with a pure gameplay focus and surprising mechanical depth.
